name: strapi-plugin-vitest
description: Strapi plugin creates a Vitest unit testing harness, that can be used to test Strapi apps and standalone Strapi plugins. It loads Strapi as a singleton that can be used by multiple test files. You don't have to require your tests from the `app.test.js` file, each test file is independent of others. It can be also used in watch mode.
